DOC.brief_summary: Background : The aim present study evaluate change microvascular density reactivity patient type 1 diabetes ( T1D ) result low intensity chronic exercise training . Methods : This study include 22 ( 34 ± 7 year ) consecutive outpatient T1D disease duration > six year . We use intravital video-microscopy measure basal skin capillary density well capillary recruitment use post-occlusive reactive hyperemia ( PORH ) dorsum finger . Endothelium-dependent -independent vasodilation skin microcirculation evaluate forearm laser Doppler perfusion monitoring ( LDPM ) system combination acetylcholine sodium nitroprusside iontophoresis , PORH local thermal hyperemia .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Low Intensity Aerobic Exercise Microvascular Endothelial Function Patients With Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects The present study perform accordance Helsinki Declaration 1975 , revise 2000 , Institutional Review Board University Hospital State University Rio de Janeiro , Brazil approve study . Once consider eligible , subject read sign informed consent document approve IRB . Study subject recruit among patient follow public hospital . Twenty-two individual T1D diagnose 6 year , 25 50 year age ( mean 34 ± 7 year ) include study . The initial clinical evaluation include patient history physical examination well record follow anthropometric data : weight , height , waist circumference body mass index ( BMI ) . Blood pressure measurement collect patient supine position 5 minute quiet surroundings ; repeat twice two-minute interval measurement . All measurement perform twelve week physical training . Blood sample laboratory test On morning schedule evaluation cutaneous microcirculation , patient present 12-hour fasted condition blood collection . Smokers smoke ingested caffeine night completion test . The following variable measure : fast postprandial plasma glucose , total cholesterol , LDL HDL cholesterol , triglyceride , transaminase , high-sensitivity C-reactive protein , gamma-glutamyl transferase , creatine kinase , urea , creatinine , albumin uric acid colorimetric reaction use Cobas Mira-machine ( Roche ) . Blood sample collect physical training period . LDL cholesterol calculate use Friedewald 's formula . Serum sample kept frozen -80°C measurement IL-6 level commercial ELISA kit ( Cayman Chemical Company , Ann Arbor , MI , USA ) , accord manufacturer 's instruction . Physical train The study participant follow aerobic training protocol target low intensity correspond 45 % heart rate ( HR ) reserve [ ( HRmax - HRrest ) x 45 % + HRrest ] . The exercise session conduct 4 time per week 12 week include alternate walk running , accordance patient 's fitness level , heart rate reserve 40-50 % . The heart rate monitor use heart rate monitor ( Polar Electro Oy , Kempele , Finland ) . In first four week training , additional increment 10 minute per session every week promote gradual progression volume 30 60 minute remain eight week . Capillaroscopy intra-vital videomicroscopy The capillary density , define number perfused capillary per mm2 skin area , assess high-resolution intra-vital color microscopy ( Moritex , Cambridge , UK ) use video microscopy system epi-illuminated fiber optic microscope contain 100-W mercury vapor lamp light source M200 objective final magnification 200X . The dorsum non-dominant middle phalanx use image acquisition , occur patient sat comfortably constant temperature environment ( 23±1°C ) . Images acquire saved posterior off-line analysis use semi-automatic integrated system ( Microvision Instruments , Evry , France ) . The mean capillary density calculate arithmetic mean number visible ( i.e. , spontaneously perfuse ) capillary three contiguous microscopic field 1 mm2 . A blood pressure cuff apply patient 's arm inflate suprasystolic pressure ( 50 mm Hg systolic arterial pressure ) completely interrupt blood flow three minute ( post-occlusive reactive hyperemia test , PORH test ) . After cuff release , image acquire record follow 60-90 second , maximal hyperemic response expect occur . Microvascular reactivity pharmacological stimulation The microvascular cutaneous reactivity study laser Doppler perfusion monitoring ( LDPM ) , method previously standardize validate . Real-time variation cutaneous microcirculatory flow assess LDPM system ( wavelength 780 nm ; Periflux 5001 , Perimed AB , Järfälla , Sweden ) attach pharmacological micro-iontophoresis system ( PeriIont , Perimed AB ) . The iontophoresis microelectrodes ( PF 383 , Perimed ) incorporate head laser probe ( PF 481-1 , Perimed ) , probe temperature standardize 32°C avoid variation skin temperature , consequently , measurement microvascular flow . The drug-delivery electrode fill 200 µl 1 % ACh solution ( Sigma Chemical Co. , USA ) place ventral surface forearm , away visible subcutaneous vein area skin pigmentation . Neutral electrodes current dispersion place 15 cm infusion electrode , reference point mark annotated ensure reproducibility second examination , take place end intervention period . After measure baseline flow 5 minute , four equal cumulative dos ACh ( anodal current ) apply constant intensity 0.1 mA 10 , 20 , 40 80 second , total charge 1 , 2 , 4 8 millicoulombs , respectively , allow 120-second interval dos . Recording microvascular flow induce ACh conduct 10 minute follow : 2 minute dose 2 minute allow flow reach plateau last dose . Using new delivery electrode apply different location forearm , four dos solution 1 % sodium nitroprusside ( SNP ; Sigma Chemical CO , USA ) dissolve distilled water deliver use cathodal current ( charge interval ACh ) . The laser Doppler output , semiquantitative , express arbitrary perfusion unit ( PUs ) output voltage ( 1 PU = 10 mV ) accordance general consensus ( European Laser Doppler Users Groups , London , 1992 ) . An area flow response ACh curve could define use PeriSoft Windows 2.5 software ( Perimed , Järfälla , Sweden ) ; area quantitatively measure express PU/s . Microvascular reactivity physiologic stimulation After measure rest capillary flow 5 minute use another laser probe ( PF 457 , Perimed ) position start record session , PORH test perform . Following release pressure , maximum flow area PORH curve measure . The mean value rest flow consider basal flow value . When microvascular flow return basal value PORH test ( typically 5-10 minute ) , maximal skin microvascular vasodilatation investigate prolong ( 20 minute ) local heat laser probe 42°C . The baseline microvascular flux value calculate described . Statistical analysis The value express mean ± standard error mean variable normal distribution median ( percentiles 25th - 75th ) variable non-parametric distribution , accord result Shapiro-Wilk normality test . The data analyze two-tailed paired test two-tailed Wilcoxon signed-rank test , appropriate . The null hypothesis reject P < 0.05 .
